title: Checkout error 500 on mobile
recommended_action: Escalate to payments/backend team; reference incident INC-2023-09-10.

title: Cannot login with correct password
recommended_action: Ask user to reset password; check auth-service logs for the user ID.

title: Billing double charge
recommended_action: Create refund ticket; verify in payment provider dashboard.

title: Slow dashboard load time
recommended_action: Check APM metrics; escalate to frontend and backend performance teams.

title: Email verification not received
recommended_action: Ask user to check spam; verify in email provider logs.

title: Mobile app crashes on startup
recommended_action: Ask for app version and OS; escalate to mobile team.

title: Unable to reset password
recommended_action: Send manual reset link; check token expiry configuration.

title: Export to CSV results in corrupted file
recommended_action: Escalate to reporting team; attach sample corrupted file.

title: API rate limit exceeded errors
recommended_action: Ask user to back off/retry; evaluate if higher plan limits are needed.

title: How to invite team members
recommended_action: Send help center article on team invitations.
